title: Die Hard
production_studio: 20th Century Fox, Gordon Company, Silver Pictures
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Rain Man
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father leaves a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Akira
description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

title: Big
description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot.

title: Cinema Paradiso
description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

title: Dangerous Liaisons
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: In 18th century France, a Marquise and a Vicomte play a dangerous game of seduction and betrayal.

title: Beetlejuice
description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

title: Mississippi Burning
description: Two F.B.I. Agents, with wildly different styles, arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Heathers
description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

title: Coming to America
description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Willow
description: A young farmer is chosen to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

title: Gorillas in the Mist
description: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: The Accidental Tourist
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A man who writes travel guides for people who hate to travel finds his life changed when he meets a quirky dog trainer.

title: Bull Durham
description: A fan of minor-league baseball has an affair with a young pitcher and a veteran catcher, and the three of them learn some lessons about life and love.

title: A Cry in the Dark
description: The true story of an Australian woman who was accused of murdering her baby daughter, and her long and arduous legal battle to prove her innocence.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Child's Play
description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

title: Working Girl
description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.

title: Coming to America
description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

title: The Land Before Time
description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

title: Scrooged
description: A cynically selfish television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

title: Running on Empty
description: The teenage son of two fugitives from the 1960s wants to have a normal life.

title: The Accused
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A prosecutor helps a woman who was gang-raped in a bar to bring her attackers to justice.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Dead Ringers
description: Twin gynecologists who are also identical twins take advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

title: The Vanishing
description: A man searches for his girlfriend, who mysteriously disappeared at a rest stop.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Beaches
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
description: The story of the lifelong friendship between two women, one a successful singer and the other a wealthy but unhappy housewife.

title: A World Apart
production_studio: British Screen Productions, Atlantic Entertainment Group
description: The story of a young white girl in 1960s South Africa whose parents are anti-apartheid activists.

oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A man who writes travel guides for people who hate to travel finds his life changed when he meets a quirky dog trainer.

title: Mystic Pizza
description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in a seaside town in Connecticut.

description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.
